name: unrhymed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unrhymed poetry does not use words that rhyme (= have the same last sound): The narrative is written in unrhymed verse. Haiku is a popular form of unrhymed Japanese poetry. Related word
rhyme
More examplesFewer examplesThe text consists entirely of unrhymed eleven-syllable lines.The sestina has six stanzas, each comprising six unrhymed lines.Traditionally, haiku is an unrhymed verse of 17 syllables that follow a pattern of five syllables in the first line, seven in the second, and five in the last.
